title: Priming Sugar Calculator for Homebrewing - Bottle Carbonation Guide

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Residual CO₂ (volumes) as a function of temperature (°F): Vres(T°F) = 3.0378 - 0.050062·T + 0.00026555·T² Priming sugar mass: ms = ks · Vbeer,L · max(0, Vtarget - Vres) Where: ms = sugar mass (grams) ks = sugar yield constant (grams per liter per volume CO₂) Vbeer,L = batch volume (liters) Vtarget = target carbonation (volumes CO₂)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
